hibernate-mapping.sql-query: call SEM_SP_MCO003_INSERT(?,:docNo, :contractNo, :mode, :company, cast(:recievDt as date ), cast(:samSendDt as date), cast(:samAssignSend as date), :remark, :user, :pOption, :borrowRequestId, cast(:siteNum as numeric), :siteInfoId, :fileType, :approveFlag, :status)

call SEM_SP_MCO003_INSERT_NEW(?,:docNo , :contractNo, :mode, :company , cast(:recievDt as date) , cast(:samSendDt as date) , cast(:samAssignSend as date) , :remark, :user, :pOption, :borrowRequestId , cast(:siteNum as numeric), :siteInfoId , :fileType, :approveFlag, :status)
